summary: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child whom dark forces want to eliminate.
cast: J.L. Reate|Eddie Murphy|Charles Dance|Charlotte Lewis|Victor Wong|Randall 'Tex' Cobb|James Hong|Shakti Chen|Tau Logo|Tiger Chung Lee|Pons Maar|Peter Kwong|Wally Taylor|Eric Douglas|Charles Levin|Kenneth H. Frith Jr.|Bennett Ohta|Kinko Tsubouchi|Govind Chipalu|Chantara Nop|Phok Ok|Bob Tzudiker|Cliffy Magee|Jeff Soo Hoo|Bindra Joshi|Judy Hudson|Ron Packham|Marilyn Schreffler|Frank Welker|Lorenzo Gaspar|Conrad Hurtt|Aron Kincaid|Gene LeBell|Ron Veto
title: El chico de oro
